registry.name: JAMRA Official Registry
registry.description: Curated extensions maintained by the JAMRA core team.

extensions.name: Example Catalogue
extensions.summary: Demo provider bundled with JAMRA for development and testing.
extensions.description: Reference implementation of the JAMRA extension SDK that ships with the repository.

versions.releaseNotes: Initial release of the example provider bundled with JAMRA.

extensions.name: WeebCentral
extensions.summary: WeebCentral manga source (formerly MangaSee) with comprehensive library.
extensions.description: Access to WeebCentral's extensive manga collection including official and fan scanlations. Features advanced search, filtering by genre/status/type, and high-quality image delivery.

versions.releaseNotes: Initial release with search, catalogue, manga details, chapter pages, and filter support. Bundled with cheerio dependencies.
